ValidationRule.description: If a deal is marked lost timing is not there or unresponsive - the re-engage field must have a value
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR(ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Unresponsive: Went dark"), ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c, "Timing is not there")) , ISBLANK(Suggested_Re_engage_Date__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please mark the suggested re-engage date so we can send reminders and automate follow up
